TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TemplatedControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner
Public MustInherit Class TemplatedControlDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner
public ref class TemplatedControlDesigner abstract : System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner

summary.span: 扩展基于模板的服务器控件的设计时行为。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for template-based server controls.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用模板并从类派生的控件设计器类 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control designer class that uses templates and derives from the class. 若要运行该示例，请编译代码，然后在设计宿主（如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] ）中查看设计视图中的页面。To run the example, compile the code, and then in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], view the page in Design view. 选择控件，单击 "操作" 列表以选择要修改的模板，然后使用拖放功能将控件移动到模板中。Select the control, click the action list to select a template to modify, and then use the drag-and-drop feature to move controls into the template. > [!NOTE] > 你的项目必须引用 `System.Design` 程序集。Your project must have a reference to the `System.Design` assembly. [!code-csharp[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/CS/TemplateGroupsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.aspx#2)]

para.span: 尽管此类未过时，但它是不必要的，因为模板编辑功能已内置于中 。

span.span: Although this class is not obsolete, it is unnecessary because template-editing features have been built into .

summary.span: 要处理组件更改事件的委托。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在属性更改后调用。This method is called after a property has been changed. 它允许实施者执行任何在属性更改后可能需要的后期处理。It allows the implementer to perform any post-processing that may be needed after a property change.

span.span: ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTemplateModeChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnTemplateModeChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnTemplateModeChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 提供在模板模式被更改时执行附加处理的机会。

span.span: Provides an opportunity to perform additional processing when the template mode is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 事件由设计器宿主为设计图面中控件上的某些操作引发。The event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control in the design surface. 例如，当用户进入或退出控件的模板编辑模式时，将引发事件。For example, an event is raised when the user enters or exits template editing mode for a control. 类提供用于处理事件的默认委托 。The class supplies a default delegate to handle the event. 从派生的类 重写 方法，以处理当关联控件的模板模式发生更改时引发的事件。Classes deriving from the override the method to process events that are raised when the template mode changes for the associated control. 方法允许派生类在不附加委托的情况下处理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 默认委托执行基类中模板模式更改事件所需的更新 ，然后调用 方法。The default delegate performs the updates that are required for a template mode change event in the base class, and then calls the method. 类中的基方法 返回，而不会对事件执行任何其他处理。The base method in the class returns without performing any additional processing for the event. 如果类派生自 并且重写基 方法，则默认委托将调用派生类中的重写方法。If a class derives from the and overrides the base method, the default delegate calls the override method in the derived class. 使用 属性来确定控件设计器当前是否处于模板编辑模式。Use the property to determine whether the control designer is in template editing mode currently.

para.span: 类提供的默认委托在 调用方法之前执行基类所需的所有更新 。

span.span: The default delegate that is supplied by the class performs all updates necessary for the base class before calling the method.

para.span: 在从派生的类中重写方法 ，以对设计图面中的控件执行额外的模板模式更改事件处理。

span.span: Override the method in classes deriving from the to perform additional processing for template mode change events on controls in the design surface.
ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 组件的成员特性。

span.span: The member attributes for component.

summary.span: 使设计器可以筛选它正在设计的组件将通过 对象公开的成员特性集。

span.span: Allows a designer to filter the set of member attributes the component it is designing through a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会在其相应的 Post 方法之前立即调用。This method is called immediately before its corresponding Post method. 如果要重写此方法，则在执行自己的筛选之前应调用基实现。If you are overriding this method, you should call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Use of this method is not recommended because template editing is handled in ControlDesigner. To support template editing expose template data in the TemplateGroups property and call SetViewFlags(ViewFlags.TemplateEditing, true). http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")]

[<System.Obsolete("Use of this method is not recommended because template editing is handled in ControlDesigner. To support template editing expose template data in the TemplateGroups property and call SetViewFlags(ViewFlags.TemplateEditing, true). http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")>]

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，将指定模板的内容设置为指定的内容。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sets the specified template's content to the specified content.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpdateDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

summary.span: 更新设计时 HTML。

span.span: Updates the design-time HTML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在未调用自动更新设计时 HTML 的方法的情况下更改了模板框架，则应调用此方法以刷新设计时显示。You should call this method to refresh the design-time display if the template frames have been changed without calling methods that update the design-time HTML automatically.
